analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang ldan pa zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga nye bar spyod pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi yul rnams kyi zhes bya ba'i don to // rdo rje ltar mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag nyid can du shes nas zhes pa ni bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pas /
translated: Endowed with form, sound, smell, taste, and touch indicates the objects characterized by the enjoyment of the five sense objects such as form.🔽Having understood the nature of the vajra, which is indivisible, means having understood the gnosis body, which is the nature of the three bodies of reality, enjoyment, and emanation, through the stage of self-consecration.

original: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can ye shes kyi sku shes nas zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can ye shes kyi sku shes nas zhes pa'i don to //
translated: Having understood the gnosis body, one should offer it to the deities.

original: zas su dri chu zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyang ba dang bsang pa dang sbyar bar bya ba la /
analyzed: zas su dri chu zhes bya ba la sogs pas sbyang ba dang bsang pa dang sbyar bar bya ba la /
translated: The food is urine and feces, and so forth teaches the purification, cleansing, and preparation.

original: sngon du 'gro bar bdud rtsi lnga rang gis spyad nas gtor ma'i don du lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya'o zhes ston to //
analyzed: sngon du 'gro bar bdud rtsi lnga rang gis spyad nas gtor ma'i don du lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya'o zhes ston to //
translated: Having first enjoyed the five nectars oneself, one should also offer them to the deities for the purpose of the sacrificial cake.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub skyon med pa //
translated: The Buddha’s enlightenment is flawless.

original: zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi brdar byas pa zung du 'jug pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings kyi brdar byas pa zung du 'jug pa'i go 'phang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is a symbol for the realm of non-abiding nirvana, and means the stage of union.

original: zas su zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
analyzed: zas su zhes bya ba la sogs pas /
translated: With “food” and so forth,

original: lcags kyu rnams kyang dbul bar bya //
analyzed: lcags kyu rnams kyang dbul bar bya //
translated: the hooks are also offered.

original: zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhes bstan to //
translated: This is taught.

original: khro bo'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya ba'i phyir te zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo'i 'khor la dbul bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: khro bo'i lha rnams la dbul bar bya ba'i phyir te zhes pa ni gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa'i khro bo'i 'khor la dbul bar bya zhes pa'i don to //
translated: For the sake of offering to the wrathful deities, the meaning is that they are offered to the wrathful retinue such as Yamantaka.

original: de'i tshe sha chen po brtag par bya'o zhes pa ni kha na ma tho ba med pa dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rim pas blang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i tshe sha chen po brtag par bya'o zhes pa ni kha na ma tho ba med pa dpal rdo rje bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rim pas blang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: At that time, one should consider the great meat, the meaning of which is that it is taken according to the glorious Vajra Nectar Tantra, which is free of any wrongdoing.

original: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ste zhes pa ni drag po'i las te de'i yul can ni de'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni sba bar bya ste zhes pa ni drag po'i las te de'i yul can ni de'i rgyur gyur pa'o //
translated: The secret is to be concealed, the meaning of which is that it is the object of wrathful action, and it is the cause of that.

original: sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni rnal 'byor @251b ba'i 'o //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs zhes pa ni rnal 'byor @251b ba'i 'o //
translated: “Body, speech, and mind” refers to the yogi.

original: rjes su mthun pa 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa 'byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: and later, the corresponding result occurs.

original: zhes pa ni gsod pa la sogs pa drag po'i las dang mthun par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni gsod pa la sogs pa drag po'i las dang mthun par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that one will be in accord with violent actions such as killing.

original: de yang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rgyud la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang gshin rje mthar byed kyi rgyud la sogs pa las rtogs par bya'o //
translated: And that should be understood from the Yamari Tantra and so forth.🔽Not only are those taught, etc.

original: de dag la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu bstan par ma zad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas drag po'i las kyis kyang dngos grub thob par ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de dag la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu bstan par ma zad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas drag po'i las kyis kyang dngos grub thob par ma zad kyi /
translated: The meaning is that not only is power attained by violent actions,

original: 'on kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
translated: but also mundane and supramundane powers are attained.

original: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de rnams ji lta ba bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach those just as they are,

original: ri lu la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams zhes pa ni /
analyzed: ri lu la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams zhes pa ni /
translated: the powers of the pill, etc.

original: ri lu dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs dang ral gri dang pra dbab pa dang / sman mchog dang bcud kyis len dang bdud rtsi dang / khams sbyor ba dang dbang du bya ba dang nam mkha' lding dang sa 'og grub pa dang / ro langs dang sngags smra ba dang /
analyzed: ri lu dang mig sman dang rkang mgyogs dang ral gri dang pra dbab pa dang / sman mchog dang bcud kyis len dang bdud rtsi dang / khams sbyor ba dang dbang du bya ba dang nam mkha' lding dang sa 'og grub pa dang / ro langs dang sngags smra ba dang /
translated: the accomplishments of sexual union, magnetizing, garuḍa, and subterranean travel; and the accomplishments of the zombie and mantra recitation.🔽The accomplishments similar to those are pacifying, increasing, controlling, summoning,

original: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang gsod pa dang dgar ba dang rengs pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang dgug pa dang / rnam par sdang ba dang gsod pa dang dgar ba dang rengs pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: enraging, killing, paralyzing, and so forth.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i dngos grub rnams la rnal 'byor pa de zhes pa ni khro bo la lha bshos dbul bar byed pa'i 'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i dngos grub rnams la rnal 'byor pa de zhes pa ni khro bo la lha bshos dbul bar byed pa'i 'o //
translated: The yogi/nī who offers bali to the wrathful deities will attain those accomplishments.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid legs par gnas par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni las su rung ba nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro//
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid legs par gnas par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni las su rung ba nyid 'grub par 'gyur ro//
translated: The body, speech, and mind will be well-placed, meaning that serviceability will be achieved.

original: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can gyi khro bo'i lha rnams la ste /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje rigs kyi zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa'i rigs can gyi khro bo'i lha rnams la ste /
translated: Thus, the vajra family is the wrathful deities of Akṣobhya’s family.

original: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir na sha chen 'bul lo //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi khro bo rnams la glang po'i sha dang / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi khro bo rnams la rta'i sha dang / 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi khro bo rnams la khyi'i sha dang /
analyzed: rdo rje rigs ni thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir na sha chen 'bul lo // de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi khro bo rnams la glang po'i sha dang / rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rigs kyi khro bo rnams la rta'i sha dang / 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs kyi khro bo rnams la khyi'i sha dang /
translated: Since the vajra family is the best of all, one should offer human flesh.

original: don yod grub pa'i rigs can gyi khro bo rnams la ba lang gi sha dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i rigs can gyi khro bo rnams la ba lang gi sha dbul bar bya'o //
translated: With the wrathful ones of the Tathagata family, etc., one should offer elephant flesh to the wrathful ones of the Vairocana family, horse flesh to the wrathful ones of the Ratnasaṃbhava family, dog flesh to the wrathful ones of the Amitābha family, and cow flesh to the wrathful ones of the Amoghasiddhi family.

original: dam pa zhes pa ni ba lang gi sha ste /
analyzed: dam pa zhes pa ni ba lang gi sha ste /
translated: The best is cow flesh.

original: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ba lang ni mchog yin no zhes sems so //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ba lang ni mchog yin no zhes sems so //
translated: The thought is that cows are the best in the world.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs kyis zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i tshogs kyis /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs kyis zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po'i 'brel pa dang ldan pa'i khro bo'i tshogs kyis /
translated: The host of wrathful deities is the host of wrathful deities related to the four Tathagatas, Vairocana and so forth.

original: @252a * // zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽de rnams med na ji ltar bya //
analyzed: @252a * // zhes bya ba'i don to // de rnams med na ji ltar bya //
translated: This is the meaning of and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: If they are not available, what should one do?

original: ji ltar bshad pa'i cho gas gzung ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sham rnyed na zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ji ltar bshad pa'i cho gas gzung ba'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sham rnyed na zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means if one cannot obtain meat free from the faults of being held by the ritual explained above.

original: zas gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa dang mi 'gal ba gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sha ste bag zan gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas de dang 'dra ba'i phyugs rnams kyi brtags pa'i sha zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zas gzhan zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te zhes pa ni 'jig rten pa dang mi 'gal ba gzugs brnyan la sogs pa'i sha ste bag zan gyis gzugs brnyan byas nas de dang 'dra ba'i phyugs rnams kyi brtags pa'i sha zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The verse beginning other food and so forth explains that one should not eat the meat of animals killed for the sake of consumption, but that one may eat the meat of animals that have died naturally, or that have been killed by others, such as hunters.

original: 'bras chen no zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras chan bza' ba bkag par bya ste /
analyzed: 'bras chen no zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'bras chan bza' ba bkag par bya ste /
translated: The verse beginning rice, barley, wheat, and so forth prohibits the eating of rice and so forth.

original: 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa'i bza' bas de ni dngos grub kyi yan lag ma yin te khyad par du ni khro bo'i rgyal po tshim pa zhes smos ci dgos /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa'i bza' bas de ni dngos grub kyi yan lag ma yin te khyad par du ni khro bo'i rgyal po tshim pa zhes smos ci dgos /
translated: Since it is in accord with all the worlds, it is not a branch of spiritual power, let alone the satisfaction of the kings of wrath.

original: 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the result,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa bsgom pa khro bo rnams la zas dbul ba'i bar gyis mthong ba'i chos su skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba rdo rje'i sku thob pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas sngar bshad pa'i phra mo'i rnal 'byor la sogs pa bsgom pa khro bo rnams la zas dbul ba'i bar gyis mthong ba'i chos su skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pa dang bral ba rdo rje'i sku thob pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya
translated: it is said that by the practice of subtle yoga and so forth as previously explained, up to the offering of food to the wrathful ones, one attains the nature of the vajra body free from birth, abiding, and destruction in this very life.

original: ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.

original: rigs de dang 'brel pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas srid pa'i rtse mo'i steng na gnas mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhugs pa 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dang / rang gi phyag rgya gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo dang bcas pa de dang de'i rigs kyi 'brel pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyang sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i lcags kyu phul bas sgrub pa po la mgu
analyzed: rigs de dang 'brel pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas srid pa'i rtse mo'i steng na gnas mngon par dga' ba la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing la bzhugs pa 'khor los sgyur ba lnga dang / rang gi phyag rgya gzugs rdo rje ma la sogs pa'i lha mo dang bcas pa de dang de'i rigs kyi 'brel pa dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyang sngags kyis sbyangs pa'i lcags kyu phul bas sgrub pa po la mgu
translated: The one connected with that family and so on indicates that the five chakravartins abiding above the peak of existence in the buddhafields of Abhirati and so on, together with their consorts such as Ruparati, and the bodhisattvas such as Kshitigarbha who are connected with that and that family, are pleased with the practitioner through the offering of the mantra purified iron hook.🔽

original: zhing mngon du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
analyzed: zhing mngon du 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bstan to //
translated: The phrase related to that lineage and so forth indicates that the five chakravartins who reside above the peak of existence, in the buddhafields of Abhirati and so forth, together with their consorts, the goddesses Rupavajra and so forth, and the bodhisattvas Kshitigarbha and so forth, who are related to that and that lineage, will be pleased with the practitioner and will appear to him through the offering of the mantra-refined hook, but not otherwise.

original: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to demonstrate just that,

original: rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa byas nas zhes pa ni rigs dang rigs can dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi rigs kyi mchod pa byas nas zhes pa ni rigs dang rigs can dbyer med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is said that, having made offerings to one's lineage, the lineage and the one belonging to the lineage are inseparable.

original: 'di skad bshad pa yin te sngags kyis brlabs pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lcags kyu lnga phul bas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa la kun tu bsrung zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di skad bshad pa yin te sngags kyis brlabs pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lcags kyu lnga phul bas mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang lha mo dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa la kun tu bsrung zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: This is what is being said: by offering the five hooks, which are free of the fault of being consecrated by mantra, the yogin is completely protected and cared for by the hosts of Akṣobhya and so forth, the tathāgatas, goddesses, bodhisattvas, and wrathful ones.

original: yang 'di nyid kyi phan yon zhes bya bas ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yang 'di nyid kyi phan yon zhes bya bas ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid can zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Moreover, “this very benefit” means the characteristics of the mundane and supramundane, that is the meaning.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa @252b bstan par bya ba'i phyir //🔽gtor ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa @252b bstan par bya ba'i phyir // gtor ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
translated: In order to teach the supramundane,

original: zhes pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes pa smos te /
translated: he says, “By this method of the bali,

original: lcags kyu dbul ba'i sbyor bas so //
analyzed: lcags kyu dbul ba'i sbyor bas so //
translated: by the method of offering the hooks.

original: byang chub pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: “One attains awakening” means one attains the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: rnam par dag pa rjes su dran pas lha bshos dbul bas ye shes kyi tshogs thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa rjes su dran pas lha bshos dbul bas ye shes kyi tshogs thob par 'gyur gyi gzhan du ni ma yin te /
translated: By offering sacrificial cakes through recollection of the pure ones, one obtains the accumulation of intuition, not otherwise,

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is the cause of the accumulation of merit.

original: bsod nams kyi tshogs de yang de las dman pa yin te so so'i skye bo bzhin no //
analyzed: bsod nams kyi tshogs de yang de las dman pa yin te so so'i skye bo bzhin no //
translated: And that accumulation of merit is inferior to that, like that of the ordinary man.

original: ye shes dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ye shes kyi tshogs thob pa 'ba' zhig tu dgag par byed do //
analyzed: ye shes dang ldan pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ye shes kyi tshogs thob pa 'ba' zhig tu dgag par byed do //
translated: He refutes the idea that one obtains only the accumulation of intuition, etc.

original: 'dod pa'i khams ni bud med thams cad ces pa ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams ni bud med thams cad ces pa ni 'dod pa'i longs spyod kyi bde ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The desire realm is all women, because it is the basis of the pleasure of enjoying desires.

original: bud med thams cad ni lha mo dang klu mo la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bud med thams cad ni lha mo dang klu mo la sogs pa'o //
translated: All women are goddesses, nagas, etc.

original: ji skad du /
analyzed: ji skad du /
translated: As it is said:

original: lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo //
analyzed: lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo //
translated: Goddesses, nagas, yakshas,

original: lha ma yin mo mi mo yang //
analyzed: lha ma yin mo mi mo yang //
translated: Asuras, and human women

original: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya //🔽de ltar sgrub ste the tshom med //
analyzed: rnyed nas rig pa'i brtul zhugs bya // de ltar sgrub ste the tshom med //
translated: are to be won by the spiritual discipline of knowledge.

original: ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ces 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus one should practice without doubt.

original: de rnams kyi yul la dga' ba'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni thams cad rnams kyang dbang du byas pas rol pa'i bdag por 'gyur te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi yul la dga' ba'i dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa ni thams cad rnams kyang dbang du byas pas rol pa'i bdag por 'gyur te /
translated: One becomes the lord of the play of all of them means that one becomes the lord of the play of all of them by bringing them under one's control.

original: de kho na nyid shes pa la phyi'i dngos grub ni zhar las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //🔽de yang / ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi //
analyzed: de kho na nyid shes pa la phyi'i dngos grub ni zhar las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // de yang / ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi //
translated: Since the external powers are by-products of the knowledge of reality,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni le'u bcu gsum pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni le'u bcu gsum pa las 'chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and thirty-six Sumerus and so on will be explained in chapter thirteen.

original: las kyis zhes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i las kyis nye bar mtshon pa 'gro ba lnga'o //
analyzed: las kyis zhes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i las kyis nye bar mtshon pa 'gro ba lnga'o //
translated: The five migrations are characterized by virtuous, nonvirtuous, and neutral karma and so on.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes pa ni sa brgyad pa la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob par bya'o //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'o zhes pa ni sa brgyad pa la bskyed pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis thob par bya'o //
translated: The irreversible is to be attained by the generation stage samādhi on the eighth stage.

original: de'i las ni gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de'i las ni gzhan gyi don gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: Its action is the characteristic of the benefit of others.

original: sems can smin cing grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no zhes pa ni ma bsgral ba sgrol bar byed pa dang / ma grol ba grol bar byed pa dang / dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa dang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //🔽yongs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor chen @253a * //
analyzed: sems can smin cing grol bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid can no zhes pa ni ma bsgral ba sgrol bar byed pa dang / ma grol ba grol bar byed pa dang / dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs dbyung ba sbyin pa dang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar bya zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // yongs su brtags pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi zhes pa ni bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams dang / rnal 'byor chen @253a * //
translated: The characteristic of the bodhisattva is to ripen and liberate sentient beings, which means to liberate those not liberated, to liberate those not liberated, to give relief to those not relieved, and to attain complete nirvana for those who have not attained complete nirvana.

original: po'i rgyud kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim gyis sa bcu gnyis pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: po'i rgyud kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mchog tu gyur pa ni zung du 'jug pa'i rim gyis sa bcu gnyis pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The supreme among all yogis who are thoroughly imagined are those of the Action Tantra, Conduct Tantra, Yoga Tantra, and Great Yoga Tantra, and the supreme among them is the one who attains the twelfth stage by the stage of union.

original: sdug bsngal ba zhes pa ni sdug bsngal gsum mo //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba zhes pa ni sdug bsngal gsum mo //
translated: The suffering is the three sufferings.

original: yid mi bde ba zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bag chags kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba zhes pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bag chags kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: Mental unhappiness is the characteristic of the habitual tendencies of passion and so on.

original: zil gyis mi gnon pa'i gzi brjid ni de rnam par spyod par byed pa 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi snang ba'o //
analyzed: zil gyis mi gnon pa'i gzi brjid ni de rnam par spyod par byed pa 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi snang ba'o //
translated: The splendor that cannot be overwhelmed is the light that has the characteristic of the clear light that causes one to experience that.

original: de yod pas na gzi brjid can no zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba mngon du byas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de yod pas na gzi brjid can no zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba mngon du byas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Since it exists, it is splendid, which means that the clear light is actualized.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis zhes pa ni rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad kyis zhes pa ni rnyed pa dang mi rnyed pa la sogs pas so //
translated: The eight worldly dharmas are gain, loss, and so on.

original: zung du 'jug pa thob pas 'jig rten gyi chos mngon du mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: zung du 'jug pa thob pas 'jig rten gyi chos mngon du mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since one has attained union, the worldly dharmas do not manifest.

original: gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no duality.🔽As it is said:

original: ji ltar drag po rdo rje can //
analyzed: ji ltar drag po rdo rje can //
translated: Just as the powerful one with the vajra

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and so on.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mi shigs pa tshe dang na sos ldan pa ste bsam gtan gyi zas kyis mi 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du mi shigs pa tshe dang na sos ldan pa ste bsam gtan gyi zas kyis mi 'jigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Vajrasattva” and so forth: like Vajrasattva, one becomes immortal, endowed with eternal youth, because one is fearless through the food of concentration.

original: rtag tu rab tu dga' bar gyur pas na zhes pa ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba la longs spyod pas mi zad pa'i dga' ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtag tu rab tu dga' bar gyur pas na zhes pa ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba la longs spyod pas mi zad pa'i dga' ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Always greatly delighted” means one obtains inexhaustible delight through enjoying the bliss of concentration.

original: rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa zhes pa ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la brtan pa la ltos pas so //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po dang ldan pa zhes pa ni bya ba la sogs pa'i tshul la brtan pa la ltos pas so //
translated: “Endowed with great yoga” means one is steadfast in the method of action and so forth.

original: mthong ba ni khong du chud pa ste zhes pa ni skad kyi byings don du ma yin pas mthong ba ni shes pa'i don la 'jug go //🔽mig ni mthong ba ste mig gi rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: mthong ba ni khong du chud pa ste zhes pa ni skad kyi byings don du ma yin pas mthong ba ni shes pa'i don la 'jug go // mig ni mthong ba ste mig gi rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: “Seeing” means understanding, because the verbal root has many meanings, “seeing” is used for the meaning of knowing.🔽“Eye” means seeing, fully knowing with eye consciousness.

original: rna bas mthong ba zhes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rna bas mthong ba zhes pa ni rna ba'i rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: “Ear” means seeing, fully knowing with ear consciousness.

original: yid kyis mthong ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyis mthong ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: The seeing of the mind is the thorough understanding by the mental consciousness.

original: de la mthong ba tsam zhes pa ni mig la sogs pas mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs par byas nas so //
analyzed: de la mthong ba tsam zhes pa ni mig la sogs pas mthong ba dang thos pa dang rtogs par byas nas so //
translated: Therein, the mere seeing is the seeing, hearing, and understanding by the eye, etc.

original: sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba zhes pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sna tshogs pas rnam par phye ba zhes pa ni slob pa dang mi slob pa la sogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The differentiation by variety is the possession of the distinctions of the learner, the post-learner, etc.

original: dbang du byed par 'gyur ba ste zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pas so //
analyzed: dbang du byed par 'gyur ba ste zhes pa ni mngon par shes pa thob pas so //
translated: The subjugation is by the attainment of the superknowledges.

original: spyi'i spros pas 'grub par bya ba las kyi rab 'byams kyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: spyi'i spros pas 'grub par bya ba las kyi rab 'byams kyi sgo nas dbang du 'gyur zhe na /
translated: If it be asked, “How is there subjugation by means of the variety of rites to be accomplished by the proliferation of the general?

original: smras pa ma yin te /🔽phyi'i sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ni ngag gis bzlas par bya @253b ba'i ye ge'i bdag nyid can ni sngags so //
analyzed: smras pa ma yin te / phyi'i sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs pa ni ngag gis bzlas par bya @253b ba'i ye ge'i bdag nyid can ni sngags so //
translated: ” it is said: “No, because🔽the external mantras, seals, etc. are the nature of the syllables to be recited by the voice, and the mantra is the characteristic of the action of the hand, etc.

original: lag pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par ni phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: lag pa'i bya ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid khyad par ni phyag rgya'o //
translated: The seal is the characteristic of the action of the hand, etc.

original: de rnams kyis bskul ba ni drangs pas dbang byed par mi 'gyur gyi 'on kyang lhun gyis grub pas so //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bskul ba ni drangs pas dbang byed par mi 'gyur gyi 'on kyang lhun gyis grub pas so //
translated: The urging of those is not by being drawn, but rather by spontaneity.

original: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs pa //
translated: The past and the future

original: da ltar byung ba srid gsum gyi //🔽'od gsal rnam par dag 'dzin pas //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba srid gsum gyi // 'od gsal rnam par dag 'dzin pas //
translated: and the present of the three worlds🔽are seen in an instant without exception

original: skad cig de la ma lus mthong //
analyzed: skad cig de la ma lus mthong //
translated: by the clear light that holds the pure.

original: ya yi don gyis ci yang rung //
analyzed: ya yi don gyis ci yang rung //
translated: The meaning of ya is anything.

original: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pas bya ba ni //
translated: The one who desires power should do

original: ra la sogs pa gsum gyis ni //
analyzed: ra la sogs pa gsum gyis ni //
translated: the three with ra and so forth,🔽and engage in the welfare of the world.

original: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i don la rab tu 'jug / ces 'byung ngo //
translated: And:

original: don dam par ni don gcig mthong ba na //
analyzed: don dam par ni don gcig mthong ba na //
translated: When one sees the one meaning ultimately,

original: 'gro ba thams cad don gcig mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad don gcig mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: one sees the one meaning of all migrators.

original: 'gram gyi phyogs su chu ni 'thungs pa yis //
analyzed: 'gram gyi phyogs su chu ni 'thungs pa yis //
translated: By drinking water from the side,

original: rgya mtsho ma lus pa ni myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rgya mtsho ma lus pa ni myong bar 'gyur //
translated: one experiences the entire ocean.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: And:

original: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa las mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ngo zhes pa la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa las mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ngo zhes pa la mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: The result of signlessness does not arise from abiding in a concentration with signs.

original: de la gnas pa ni de la dmigs pa la'o //
analyzed: de la gnas pa ni de la dmigs pa la'o //
translated: Abiding in that is observing that.

original: mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu ni mi 'gyur ba thar pa chen po'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu ni mi 'gyur ba thar pa chen po'i bde ba'i mtshan nyid can gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The result of signlessness is not attaining buddhahood, which is characterized by the bliss of great immutable liberation.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu mi 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause and result are not similar.

original: rgyu mthun pa las 'bras bu 'dra bar 'gyur te gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa las 'bras bu 'dra bar 'gyur te gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: A result is similar to its cause, not otherwise.

original: nas kyi sa bon las 'bras kyi myu gu bzhin no //
analyzed: nas kyi sa bon las 'bras kyi myu gu bzhin no //
translated: Like a barley seed, a barley sprout arises.

original: de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa las mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: de bzhin du sngags dang phyag rgya la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa las mtshan ma med pa'i 'bras bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi //
translated: Similarly, the result of signlessness does not arise from a yogin abiding in mantra and mudra.

original: 'on kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la'o //
translated: Rather, it arises from abiding in nonconceptual concentration.

original: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud ni gnyi ga'i rgyud de /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud ni gnyi ga'i rgyud de /
translated: The Tantra of the Manifest Enlightenment of Vairocana is a tantra of both.

original: de las gsungs pa zhes bya ba 'dis lung tshad ma nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: de las gsungs pa zhes bya ba 'dis lung tshad ma nyid du bstan to //
translated: By this as it is taught there he shows the validity of scripture.

original: bde ba thams cad bsdus pa ni bde ba thams cad de 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba thams cad bsdus pa ni bde ba thams cad de 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The collection of all bliss is all bliss, which is clear light.

original: lhun gyis grub pa nyid do zhes pa ni 'bad rtsol med pas rdzogs par 'gyur te zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la de kho na nyid rang gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhun gyis grub pa nyid do zhes pa ni 'bad rtsol med pas rdzogs par 'gyur te zung du 'jug pa'i rim pa la de kho na nyid rang gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Spontaneously present means that it is perfected without effort, because reality is self-evident in the stage of union.

original: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
analyzed: zung 'jug ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
translated: Abiding in the concentration of union,

original: slar zhing gang la yang mi slob po //
analyzed: slar zhing gang la yang mi slob po //
translated: one does not train in anything again.

original: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes //
analyzed: 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes //
translated: This is called the yoga of perfection,

original: de yang rdo rje 'chang chen po //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje 'chang chen po //
translated: and that is also Great Vajradhara.

original: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i //
translated: Endowed with the best of all aspects,

original: de las thams cad mkhyen @254a * //🔽pa 'byung // zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las thams cad mkhyen @254a * // pa 'byung // zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: from that arises omniscience.

original: nye bar bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: nye bar bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the summary, he says:

original: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad de //
analyzed: rtog pa'i rnal 'byor thams cad de //
translated: All yogas of imagination

original: zhes pa ni tha mal pa'i spros pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir lha'i sku sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni tha mal pa'i spros pa thams cad spong ba'i phyir lha'i sku sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the body of the deity in order to abandon all the elaborations of the ordinary.

original: de rnams kyi phul du byung ba'i zhes pa ni dbang po rno ba yin pas dam pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi phul du byung ba'i zhes pa ni dbang po rno ba yin pas dam pa'o //
translated: Of those, the best are the best because they have sharp faculties.

original: rtogs shing zhes pa ni rim pa lnga yongs su shes pa'o //
analyzed: rtogs shing zhes pa ni rim pa lnga yongs su shes pa'o //
translated: Having realized means having fully understood the five stages.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o zhes pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa lnga po sgom par byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'o zhes pa ni rdo rje bzlas pa la sogs pa'i rim pa lnga po sgom par byed pa'o //
translated: Abiding in the samādhi of the completion stage means meditating on the five stages such as vajra repetition.

original: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sba ba ste rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i tshul la brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang ba ni sba ba ste rnal 'byor pa de rnams kyis bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i tshul la brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: The secret of those is to be kept hidden, and should not be taught to yogins who rely on the methods of Action and other tantras.

original: de sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni drang ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi dbye bas rnam pa gnyis dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa ni drang ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi dbye bas rnam pa gnyis dang phra mo'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis kyis bsdus pa'i rnal 'byor pa la bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The consecration of the body, speech, and mind is the indirect, and the consecration of the three mysteries is the direct, instruction for the yogi who is included in the two kinds of yoga, the subtle and the coarse.

original: byang chub dam pa zhes pa ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa la ltos nas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba zung du 'jug pa'i skad cig ma rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: byang chub dam pa zhes pa ni nyan thos pa la sogs pa la ltos nas rdo rje'i sku zhes bya ba zung du 'jug pa'i skad cig ma rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The highest enlightenment is the stage of Great Vajradhara, the moment of union called the vajra body in contrast to the disciples and so on.

original: des thob par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni //
analyzed: des thob par 'gyur ba zhes pa ni //
translated: It is attained by that

original: sngar bshad pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas de mngon du byed pas so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa bsgom pa'i sgo nas de mngon du byed pas so //
translated: because it is realized by means of the meditation explained above.

original: nye bar brtags pas so zhes pa ni rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa ste mar ni tshe bzhin no //
analyzed: nye bar brtags pas so zhes pa ni rgyu la 'bras bu nye bar brtags pa ste mar ni tshe bzhin no //
translated: The examination is the examination of the effect in the cause, like the butter in the milk.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'o zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'o zhes pa ni sku rdo rje la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The secret of the Tathagata means the secret called the consecration by the vajra body and so on.

original: tha mal pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems las zhes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i rang bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i lus la sogs pa las so //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems las zhes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i rang bzhin bden pa ma mthong ba'i lus la sogs pa las so //
translated: From the ordinary body, speech, and mind means from the body, etc. that are of the nature of the five appropriated aggregates and have not seen the truth.

original: 'da' ba ni sbyang ba ste ting nge 'dzin gang gis dag par bya ba kho na nyid de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'da' ba ni sbyang ba ste ting nge 'dzin gang gis dag par bya ba kho na nyid de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Passing beyond means purification, and that samādhi by which there is purification is called just that.

original: de nyid ni de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang de nyid de nye bar btags pas so //
analyzed: de nyid ni de kho na nyid thob par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yang de nyid de nye bar btags pas so //
translated: That itself is the samādhi that causes the attainment of reality, and it is designated as such.

original: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdus pa bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas nye bar bsdus pa bstan te /
translated: The summary is taught by This is taught as... and so on.

original: tha mal pa'i lus zhes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: tha mal pa'i lus zhes pa ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: The ordinary body is characterized by the five appropriated aggregates.

original: brtag par bya ba spangs pa'o //
analyzed: brtag par bya ba spangs pa'o //
translated: It is to be abandoned means to be rejected.

original: gang gis ni sgom pa'i rim pas so //
analyzed: gang gis ni sgom pa'i rim pas so //
translated: By what? By the stage of meditation.

original: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi lus thob par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin @254b 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi lus thob par 'gyur ba'i zhes pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rang bzhin @254b 'grub par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The phrase one attains a body of the nature of vajra means that one attains the nature of transcendent Great Vajradhara.

original: de kho na nyid de lta bu yin no zhes pa la le'u drug pa 'di nyid las gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid de lta bu yin no zhes pa la le'u drug pa 'di nyid las gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: This is the suchness. The phrase in this very chapter means in this chapter on the sixth stage.

original: de skad du zhes pa ni gsang ba grub pa las zhes tshig lhag ma'o //🔽rnam rtog med pa'i sngags pas ni //
analyzed: de skad du zhes pa ni gsang ba grub pa las zhes tshig lhag ma'o // rnam rtog med pa'i sngags pas ni //
translated: The phrase it is said is a continuation of the phrase in the Establishment of the Secret.

original: zhes pa la sgom pa la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas so //
analyzed: zhes pa la sgom pa la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas so //
translated: The phrase the mantra practitioner who is free of discursive thought means that he is free of the discursive thought that is attached to meditation.

original: 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pa dag ces pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang ldan pas so //
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pa dag ces pa ni sngar bshad pa'i rnam pa gnyis kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de dang ldan pas so //
translated: The phrase those who possess such a samādhi means that they possess the samādhi that has the two aspects explained above.

original: nges pa'i dus ni zhes pa zla ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od tsam gyi dus kyi tshad yongs su spangs nas so //
analyzed: nges pa'i dus ni zhes pa zla ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'od tsam gyi dus kyi tshad yongs su spangs nas so //
translated: The phrase at a definite time means that they abandon the measure of time that is merely the light of the characteristics of the moon and so on.

original: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: bla med go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
translated: One attains the unsurpassed state.

original: zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid rdo rje 'chang chen po'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro zhes tshigs su bcad pa'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning of the verse: one attains the state of Great Vajradhara, the characteristic of Mahāmudrā.

original: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni lcags kyu lnga'i lha bshos 'bul bas bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to zhes pa ni lcags kyu lnga'i lha bshos 'bul bas bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The interpretable meaning is because it teaches the attainment of the unsurpassed state by offering the five hook-offerings.

original: rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje phreng sa'i rgyud las tshad ma nyid du bstan to //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig ces bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje phreng sa'i rgyud las tshad ma nyid du bstan to //
translated: The phrase Vajra words and so forth teaches the validity of the Vajra-garland Tantra.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni sngar bshad zin to //🔽skad cig ni se gol brdab pa'i dus so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don ni sngar bshad zin to // skad cig ni se gol brdab pa'i dus so //
translated: The meaning of the verse beginning Then has been explained above.🔽 An instant is the time of a finger snap.

original: thang cig ni yungs kar bskor ba'i dus so //
analyzed: thang cig ni yungs kar bskor ba'i dus so //
translated: A moment is the time of a mustard seed rolling.

original: yud tsam ni dbugs dbyung ba'o //
analyzed: yud tsam ni dbugs dbyung ba'o //
translated: A period is the time of an exhalation.

original: zhag bco lnga ni zla ba phyed do //
analyzed: zhag bco lnga ni zla ba phyed do //
translated: Fifteen days is a fortnight.

original: zhag sum cu ni zla ba'o //
analyzed: zhag sum cu ni zla ba'o //
translated: Thirty days is a month.

original: de bcu gnyis kyis lo'i dus so //
analyzed: de bcu gnyis kyis lo'i dus so //
translated: Twelve of those is a year.

original: de rnam pa drug gis dus kyi dbye ba'o //
analyzed: de rnam pa drug gis dus kyi dbye ba'o //
translated: That is the division of time by six aspects.

original: de rnams kyis 'jig rten pa 'di 'gro ba dang ldog pas srid par 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pas ngal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyis 'jig rten pa 'di 'gro ba dang ldog pas srid par 'khor bar 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'jig pas ngal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By those, this world revolves in existence through going and returning, and becomes exhausted through birth, abiding, and destruction.

original: de bas na rnam pa drug la gnas pa'i dus de dang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po ni thig le drug cu'i rtsis su ma 'gyur la brten te dus kyi spros pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na rnam pa drug la gnas pa'i dus de dang bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po ni thig le drug cu'i rtsis su ma 'gyur la brten te dus kyi spros pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Therefore, that time abiding in six aspects, and the three incalculable aeons, are not calculated in the reckoning of sixty moments, and are the elaboration of time.

original: de ni / skad cig gcig ni yin par bshad //
analyzed: de ni / skad cig gcig ni yin par bshad //
translated: That is explained as one moment.

original: ces pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis mos pa'i 'od gsal bas myong bar bya ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ces pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis mos pa'i 'od gsal bas myong bar bya ba'i skad cig ma zhes bya'o //
translated: That is said to be one moment, the moment of experience by the clear light of aspiration.

original: zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin //
analyzed: zla ba drug bshad de nyid yin //
translated: That itself is explained as six months.🔽That is said to be six months, the division of time having the characteristic explained previously in one moment.

original: zhes pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dus drug gi dbye ba zhes bya ba de'i dngos med gang yin pa de ni rdzogs par longs spyad pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ni skad cig ma gcig gis sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi dus drug gi dbye ba zhes bya ba de'i dngos med gang yin pa de ni rdzogs par longs spyad pa ste /
translated: That non-entity is the complete enjoyment.

original: 'od gsal ba'i sgom pa'i skad cig ma zhes bya'o //🔽de @255a * //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i sgom pa'i skad cig ma zhes bya'o // de @255a * //
translated: is called the moment of meditation on clear light.🔽That very moment is one,

original: nyid kyi skad cig ma gcig tu zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig ma'o //
analyzed: nyid kyi skad cig ma gcig tu zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis skad cig ma'o //
translated: means that the moment is characterized by the entry into clear light.

original: dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs //
analyzed: dus gsum las 'das yin par dgongs //
translated: It is considered to be beyond the three times,

original: zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar thob pa'i skad cig ma dang bral ba'i ngo bos bsam par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba dang snang ba mched pa dang snang ba nye bar thob pa'i skad cig ma dang bral ba'i ngo bos bsam par bya zhes pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: means that it should be contemplated by the nature of the essence free from the moments of appearance, increase of appearance, and culmination of appearance, which are past, future, and present.

original: gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa //
analyzed: gzugs dang sgra dang ror ldan pa //
translated: Endowed with form, sound, and taste,

original: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la spyod par gyur pas so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams la spyod par gyur pas so //
translated: means that the yogī should enjoy the objects of form, etc. , by abiding in the commitment seal.

original: rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pas ni zla drug bsgom //
translated: The yogī meditates for six months,

original: zhes pa ni dus kyi dbye ba gang yin pa de 'od gsal ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dus kyi dbye ba gang yin pa de 'od gsal ba nyid du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: means that the division of time should be meditated on as clear light.

original: mchod chen de ni zhes pa la 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mchod pa chen po de ltar byas nas so //
analyzed: mchod chen de ni zhes pa la 'od gsal ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mchod pa chen po de ltar byas nas so //
translated: Having done that great worship, which is characterized by entry into clear light,

original: gsang ba'i de nyid ces pa ni 'od gsal ba'i de nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: gsang ba'i de nyid ces pa ni 'od gsal ba'i de nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: one should meditate on the reality of the secret, which means one should meditate on the reality of clear light.

original: yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rim pas yul dang dbang po nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can rim pa gnyis pas thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de nyid bshang gci zas su byed pa'o zhes bstan
analyzed: yul dang dbang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar bshad pa'i rim pas yul dang dbang po nye bar bsdu ba'i mtshan nyid can rim pa gnyis pas thob par bya ba'i de kho na nyid gang yin pa de nyid bshang gci zas su byed pa'o zhes bstan
translated: The reality to be attained by the second stage, which is characterized by the withdrawal of the objects and faculties in the manner previously explained, is that very reality which is the food of feces and urine.

original: to // de nyid kyi de 'dra ba'i dngos grub ste /
analyzed: to // de nyid kyi de 'dra ba'i dngos grub ste /
translated: That very thing is the power,

original: de mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//
analyzed: de mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid do//
translated: which is characterized by its actualization.

original: bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o //
analyzed: bza' ba rnam rtog med pa'o //
translated: The food is non-conceptual.

original: zhes pa ni phyi'i bza' ba spangs nas bsam gtan gyi bza' ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni phyi'i bza' ba spangs nas bsam gtan gyi bza' ba'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that, having abandoned external food, one should have the character of the food of meditative concentration.

original: de nyid kyi phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the benefit of that,🔽he says,

original: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The suchness and so forth are stated.

original: bla na med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: It is the characteristic of the unsurpassed clear light.

original: byang chub sems gcig las 'byung ba'o zhes pa ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems gcig las 'byung ba'o zhes pa ni /
translated: It arises from the one thought of enlightenment

original: phyag rgya'i rim pas kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems la dmigs pa las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya'i rim pas kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems la dmigs pa las 'byung ba'o //
translated: because it arises from the observation of the conventional thought of enlightenment by means of the stage of the seal.

original: rtog pa med pa ni spros pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa ni spros pa med pa'o //
translated: It is non-conceptual, that is, free from conceptual elaborations.

original: 'dus ma byas pa ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas pa ni rnam par shes pa gsum dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is unconditioned, that is, free from the three consciousnesses.

original: dri med don ni zhes pa la rang bzhin brgya drug cu dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: dri med don ni zhes pa la rang bzhin brgya drug cu dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is stainless, that is, free from the one hundred and sixty natural instincts.

original: 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor bas mngon du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ba ni rnal 'byor bas mngon du 'gyur ro //
translated: It is accomplished, that is, realized by the yogi.

original: sems rnam bar dag pa'i rim pa'i thabs phyag rgya'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: sems rnam bar dag pa'i rim pa'i thabs phyag rgya'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
translated: The characteristic of the method of the stage of the pure thought, the stage of the seal, will now be explained.

original: ma zhes pa ni ming gi yi ge dang pos nye bar mtshon pa dang // dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang @255b bzhin m'a ma k'i'o //
analyzed: ma zhes pa ni ming gi yi ge dang pos nye bar mtshon pa dang // dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i rang @255b bzhin m'a ma k'i'o //
translated: The ma is the first letter of the name, and it is illustrated by the nature of the pledge seal, Mamaki.

original: de bzhin du ming gi yi ge dang pos nye bar mtshon pa ni phyag rgya de'i bka' drin rtogs nas mngon par byang chub pa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du ming gi yi ge dang pos nye bar mtshon pa ni phyag rgya de'i bka' drin rtogs nas mngon par byang chub pa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the first letter of the name indicates the experience of the pure nature of the enlightened mind, which is the realization of the kindness of that seal.

original: de ltar gyur pa'i bsam gtan las dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de ni dga' bcas zas te sha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i bsam gtan las dga' ba dang bcas pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de ni dga' bcas zas te sha zhes bya'o //
translated: The great bliss that is accompanied by joy from that meditation is called “joy-accompanied food,” that is, “meat.”

original: de ni bsam gtan gyi bza' bca'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid de sha'i sgra'i don to //
analyzed: de ni bsam gtan gyi bza' bca'i mtshan nyid kyi de kho na nyid de sha'i sgra'i don to //
translated: That is the reality of the characteristics of the food and drink of meditation, the meaning of the word “meat.”

original: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa las kyang /
translated: The Pradipoddyotana says:

original: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
analyzed: sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las //
translated: Among all the illusions

original: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
analyzed: bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags //
translated: the illusion of a woman is supreme.

original: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi dbye ba ni //
translated: The division of the three intuitions

original: gsal bar 'di las mtshon par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsal bar 'di las mtshon par 'gyur //
translated: is clearly indicated by this.

original: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
analyzed: chags pa ma yin chags bral min //
translated: Not attached, not detached,

original: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so //
translated: the middle is also not apprehended.

original: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
analyzed: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
translated: Not empty, not non-empty,

original: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bar ma yang ni mi dmigs so //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: the middle is also not apprehended.

original: de kho na nyid de nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra ba mtha' yas pa yin pa de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas chen po'i sgras khyad par du byas nas sha chen de ni yin par bshad pa ste tshad med pa yin pas so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid de nam mkha'i khams dang 'dra ba mtha' yas pa yin pa de'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas chen po'i sgras khyad par du byas nas sha chen de ni yin par bshad pa ste tshad med pa yin pas so //
translated: That reality is like the realm of space, and is infinite.  The great is explained as that flesh, because it is endowed with the yoga of that, and is qualified by the word great, because it is immeasurable.🔽The holy, the immeasurable, the wise,🔽the diligent, the enthusiastic,

original: dam pa tshad med mkhas pa dang // brtson 'grus spro ba'i bdag nyid dang // rmad du byung ba'i byed pa ni //
analyzed: dam pa tshad med mkhas pa dang // brtson 'grus spro ba'i bdag nyid dang // rmad du byung ba'i byed pa ni //
translated: the marvelous, the action,

original: chen po zhes byar rtag tu bshad //🔽ces 'byung ngo //
analyzed: chen po zhes byar rtag tu bshad // ces 'byung ngo //
translated: is always explained as great.

original: phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to teach the benefits,🔽he says,

original: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The secret, etc.

original: gsang ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o //
translated: The secret should not be taught to those who are yogis in the stage of generation.

original: go 'phang ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi gzhi'o //
analyzed: go 'phang ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi gzhi'o //
translated: The state is the basis of all the three realms, which have the nature of the stable and the moving.

original: mchog ni ye shes la ltos nas bla na med pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni ye shes la ltos nas bla na med pa'o //
translated: The supreme is unsurpassed in relation to gnosis.

original: de nyid kyi khyad par ni rdo rje gsum bsdu bar byed pa ni /🔽rdo rje gsum ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyi khyad par ni rdo rje gsum bsdu bar byed pa ni / rdo rje gsum ste /
translated: The distinction of that is:

original: 'od gsal ba'i ga 'phang ni rgyur gyur pa snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba'i ga 'phang ni rgyur gyur pa snang ba la sogs pa'i ye shes gsum mo //
translated: the three vajras are the three intuitions of illumination, etc.

original: de myur du 'grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas de kho na nyid phung po lnga rnam par dag par byed pa glang po la sogs pa'i lcags kyu lnga'i brdas /
analyzed: de myur du 'grub pa ni rdzogs pa ste 'od gsal ba la 'jug pas dag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // dam tshig chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pas de kho na nyid phung po lnga rnam par dag par byed pa glang po la sogs pa'i lcags kyu lnga'i brdas /
translated: The swift accomplishment of that is the perfection, the entry into the clearlight transparency, the purification.

original: brdar byas pa gang dang sbyor pas rnal 'byor pa ni bsam gtan gyi zas dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bstan te /
analyzed: brdar byas pa gang dang sbyor pas rnal 'byor pa ni bsam gtan gyi zas dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes bstan te /
translated: By the hook of the elephant, etc., which purify the five aggregates into reality, he shows that the yogi, by the union with the one who is hooked, becomes endowed with the food of meditation.

original: kham zhes pa ni phyi'i bza' ba'i ngo bo'i ming ngo //
analyzed: kham zhes pa ni phyi'i bza' ba'i ngo bo'i ming ngo //
translated: The morsel is the name of the essence of the external food.

original: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bza' ba yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'jig rten pa'i bza' ba yin no //
translated: That is the mundane food.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni @256a * //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni @256a * //
translated: The supramundane is

original: dgongs pas bshad pa bsam gtan gyi bza' ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa bsam gtan gyi bza' ba zhes bya'o //
translated: the food of meditation, which is explained by the intention.

original: de kho na nyid thob pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir gang yang zhes smos te /
analyzed: de kho na nyid thob pa'i phan yon bstan pa'i phyir gang yang zhes smos te /
translated: The verse beginning whoever is stated to show the benefit of attaining reality.

original: 'jig rten 'das mchog ces pa ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'o //🔽rnam bar mi rtog pa la mkhas //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'das mchog ces pa ni zag pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'o // rnam bar mi rtog pa la mkhas //
translated: The phrase supreme transcendence means attaining uncontaminated wisdom.

original: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid la gcig tu gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'od gsal ba'i de kho na nyid la gcig tu gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Skilled in nonconceptuality means one-pointedly focused on the reality of clear light.

original: de bzhin ni chos nyid de de nyid du ro gcig pa ni de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'khor ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin ni chos nyid de de nyid du ro gcig pa ni de'i bdag nyid du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to // 'khor ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Thus, of one taste in reality means engaging in that nature.

original: cig shos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste spangs pa ni de la dbyer med pa mngon du byed pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: cig shos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste spangs pa ni de la dbyer med pa mngon du byed pa zung du 'jug pa'i ting 'dzin la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
translated: Samsara is the nature of conventional truth, and the other is ultimate truth. Abandoning them, one becomes absorbed in the samadhi of union, which is the realization of their inseparability.

original: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs bzang po 'dis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor brtul zhugs bzang po 'dis //
translated: By this excellent yoga and observance,

original: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgom pa'i brtul zhugs bzang pos so //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sngar bshad pa'i sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgom pa'i brtul zhugs bzang pos so //
translated: This is by the good conduct of meditation having the nature of the stage of mental purification and the stage of perfection explained above.🔽The wise Bodhisattvas, etc.

original: byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang // zhes pa ni phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang // zhes pa ni phyag rgya dang ldan pa'i sa'i snying po la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: , is that of the Vajrasattvas, i.e. , of the Bodhisattvas, beginning with Kshitigarbha, who are endowed with the Seal.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur ba thob pas sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The Buddhas are pleased by the attainment of the consecration of Buddhahood.

original: dngos grub ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste rim pa lngas thob par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos grub ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste rim pa lngas thob par bya ba'i rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Attainment is perfect enlightenment, the state of Great Vajradhara to be attained by the five stages.

original: myur du ni bde ba dang yun ring po ma yin pas thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: myur du ni bde ba dang yun ring po ma yin pas thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: Quickly means that it is attained without delay, not after a long time.

original: 'dod khams dbang phyug ces pa ni khams gsum gyi bdag po'o //
analyzed: 'dod khams dbang phyug ces pa ni khams gsum gyi bdag po'o //
translated: The Lord of the Desire Realm is the master of the three realms.

original: las kyi go 'phang zhes pa ni thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi go 'phang zhes pa ni thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: The state of action is the attainment of the attainment which is the basis of all.

original: gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dbang thob pas 'bar ba dang snang ba la sogs pa ston par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes pa ni ye shes kyi dbang thob pas 'bar ba dang snang ba la sogs pa ston par byed pa'o //
translated: Possessing splendor means that he displays blazing light, etc., by having attained the power of intuition.

original: stobs kyis phyug ces pa ni gzhan la med pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: stobs kyis phyug ces pa ni gzhan la med pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs la sogs pa dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Possessing strength means that he is endowed with the Buddha's domain, which is not found in others, such as the power of knowledge of the possible and impossible.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan pas na mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad brgyad cu dang ldan pas na mdangs dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Possessing radiance means that he is endowed with the thirty-two marks and eighty signs of a great person.

original: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang thugs rje chen po dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bco brgyad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pas na mthong na dga' ba'o //
analyzed: ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang thugs rje chen po dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bco brgyad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang ldan pas na mthong na dga' ba'o //
translated: Delightful to behold means that he is endowed with the four unmixed establishments of mindfulness, the eighteen special qualities of a Buddha, and the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment.

original: mthong ba tsam gyis zhes pa ni chog @256b mi shes pa'i sku mthong bas so //
analyzed: mthong ba tsam gyis zhes pa ni chog @256b mi shes pa'i sku mthong bas so //
translated: Merely by seeing means by seeing the body of one who is never satisfied.

original: bskul nas zhes pa ni lam la 'jug par mdzad pa'o //🔽'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur //
analyzed: bskul nas zhes pa ni lam la 'jug par mdzad pa'o // 'jig rten 'di dag dbang du 'gyur //
translated: Having been urged means having been caused to enter the path.

original: zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs 'dul bar mdzad pas so //🔽nye bar bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa ni tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i tshogs 'dul bar mdzad pas so // nye bar bsdu ba bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They become the lords of these worlds means that they become the lords of the world of Brahmā and so forth.

original: 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The summary is taught by Here, and so forth.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi'o //🔽gsang ba byang chub dam pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes pa ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag rnams kyi'o // gsang ba byang chub dam pa'o //
translated: All buddhas means the persons who are like jewels.

original: zhes pa ni tsandan la sogs pa la bstan par mi bya ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to //🔽yang dag sngags kyis bsang ba 'dis //
analyzed: zhes pa ni tsandan la sogs pa la bstan par mi bya ba rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to // yang dag sngags kyis bsang ba 'dis //
translated: The secret is the sublime enlightenment means that the reality of the completion stage should not be taught to those who are like sandalwood and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni sems skyo ba bsang bar gyur pa'o //🔽rdo rje gsum 'das dam pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems skyo ba bsang bar gyur pa'o // rdo rje gsum 'das dam pa'o //
translated: This purification by the true mantra means that the mind is purified of weariness.

original: zhes pa ni ye shes gsum yongs su sbyong bar byed pa kun gyi mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes pa ni ye shes gsum yongs su sbyong bar byed pa kun gyi mchog ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The sublime one who has transcended the three vajras means that the meaning of the best of all is the purification of the three exalted wisdoms.

original: de bas na rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na gtso bo'o //
analyzed: de bas na rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa rdzogs par mdzad pas na gtso bo'o //
translated: Therefore, he is the chief, since he accomplishes the perfect fulfillment of one's own and others' goals.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po las 'byung bas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar mdzad pa'i rdo rje 'chang chen po las 'byung bas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun no //
translated: Since he arises from the Great Vajradhara, who is the collection of all the Tathagatas, he is all the Tathagatas.

original: dam tshig ni dam tshig gi spyod pas thob par bya ba bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngags kyi sku'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni dam tshig gi spyod pas thob par bya ba bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sngags kyi sku'o //
translated: The commitment is the mantra body of the yogis of the creation stage, which is to be attained by the practice of the commitments.

original: de las kyang dam tshig ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thob pa sngags kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid de rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de las kyang dam tshig ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim pas thob pa sngags kyi de kho na nyid mngon du byed pa'i mtshan nyid de rdo rje bzlas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: And from that, the commitment is the stage of vajra repetition, which has the characteristic of manifesting the reality of the mantra by attaining it through the process of entry and so forth.

original: de las kyang mchog ni sems la dmigs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: de las kyang mchog ni sems la dmigs pa'i de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: And from that, the supreme is the stage of mind observation, which has the characteristic of reality.

original: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa brjod pas so //
analyzed: nges pa'i don to zhes pa ni sems rnam par dag pa'i rim pa brjod pas so //
translated: The definitive meaning is expressed by the statement of the stage of mind-only.

original: de kho na nyid rnam par mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces pa ni 'od gsal bas so //
analyzed: de kho na nyid rnam par mi 'jigs pa'i ngo bo nyid ces pa ni 'od gsal bas so //
translated: The nature of fearlessness with respect to reality is due to clarity.

original: lus dang ngag dang yid ni ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid ni ye shes gsum mo //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the three intuitions.

original: byin gyis rlob cing bskyed pa zhes pa ni gang gis sbyang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: byin gyis rlob cing bskyed pa zhes pa ni gang gis sbyang bar bya ba'o //
translated: Empowerment and generation are that by which one is purified.

original: de brjod pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyi le'u ni zhes pa la de'i don ston par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs ni le'u zhes bya'o//
analyzed: de brjod pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyi le'u ni zhes pa la de'i don ston par byed pa'i tshig gi tshogs ni le'u zhes bya'o//
translated: The chapter of the scripture that expresses that is called a chapter.

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i 'grel ba'i t'i k'a las le'u drug pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa'i 'grel ba'i t'i k'a las le'u drug pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
translated: This concludes the detailed explanation of the sixth chapter in the commentary Luminous Light.

original: // / de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa brtsam par bya ste /🔽rnal 'byor pa tha mal pa dang mchog rnams kyi zhes pa ni rim pa gnyis sgom par byed pa'i @257a * //
analyzed: // / de ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pas le'u bdun pa'i bshad pa brtsam par bya ste / rnal 'byor pa tha mal pa dang mchog rnams kyi zhes pa ni rim pa gnyis sgom par byed pa'i @257a * //
translated: The explanation of the seventh chapter begins with “Thus” and so forth.

original: sgrub pa po rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa po rnams kyi'o //
translated: The yogis and yoginis, both ordinary and sublime, are the practitioners who cultivate the two stages.

original: spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa las bshad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: spyod pa'i le'u lnga pa las bshad pa rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The three types of conduct are explained in the fifth chapter.

original: yang dag par bstan nas zhes pa ni rnam par bshad nas so //
analyzed: yang dag par bstan nas zhes pa ni rnam par bshad nas so //
translated: Having taught perfectly means having explained.

original: de nyid slar yang spros nas bshad pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rgyas par so sor bshad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid slar yang spros nas bshad pa'i phyir zhes pa ni rgyas par so sor bshad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: In order to explain that again in detail means in order to explain each part extensively.

original: dam tshig chen po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pas na dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po de bzhin gshegs pa lnga spro ba dang bsdu bar mdzad pas na dam tshig chen po ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o zhes bya'o //
translated: The great commitment is the Great Vajradhara, because he emanates and gathers the five Tathagatas.

original: yan lag drug go zhes pa ni so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de de'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te des nye bar brtags pas so //
analyzed: yan lag drug go zhes pa ni so sor sdud pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de de'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur te des nye bar brtags pas so //
translated: The stage of the six limbs is the nature of withdrawal, etc. , and one will attain that stage, because of his examination.

original: thun mong ma yin pa'i sgrub pa po zhes pa ni rdo rje bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa'i sgrub pa po zhes pa ni rdo rje bzhi pa'o //
translated: The uncommon adept is the one who has the four vajras.

original: de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob pa ni zhes pa la yan lag drug dang / rdo rje bzhi pos sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku thob pa ste rdo rje 'chang ba nyid do //
analyzed: de dag gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa thob pa ni zhes pa la yan lag drug dang / rdo rje bzhi pos sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku thob pa ste rdo rje 'chang ba nyid do //
translated: Their attainment of manifest, complete enlightenment means that by the six limbs and the four vajras, they attain the mantra body and the gnosis body, which is Vajradhara.

original: de'i don gyi le'u ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro //🔽tha mal mchog gi dbye ba yis //
analyzed: de'i don gyi le'u ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro // tha mal mchog gi dbye ba yis //
translated: The chapter that explains its meaning is called “the chapter of the meaning of the words.”🔽The approach is twofold,

original: bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis yin te //
analyzed: bsnyen pa rnam pa gnyis yin te //
translated: by the division of ordinary and supreme.

original: tha mal pa ni rdo rje bzhi //
analyzed: tha mal pa ni rdo rje bzhi //
translated: The ordinary is the four vajras,

original: mchog ni yan lag drug gis so //🔽zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mchog ni yan lag drug gis so // zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: the supreme is the six-branched yoga.

original: 'dod pa thams cad ces bya ba 'dis spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad ces bya ba 'dis spros pa dang bcas pa'i spyod pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Here, “all desires” is stated in order to teach the elaborate mode of conduct.

original: nye bar brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: nye bar brtsam par bya ste /
translated: One should undertake it.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams so //
translated: The objects are forms and so forth.

original: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'am logs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya la gnas pa'am logs su gnas pa'o //
translated: This is the pledge seal, or it is the seal of the individual.

original: rjes su myong zhing bsten pas so //
